display_long_description:
Welcome to **Grimlord** - a Dark Fantasy Action Souls-like RPG built on Unreal Engine 5 for VR. Grimlord brings combat in VR like never before. You’re left to learn how to deal with them efficiently - for survival’s sake.
[media]
[media]
Awakened in a monastery deep in the Lonely Mountains, you walk in an epic quest as the adventurer standing before the darkness and striving for the light against the tyrannical Grim Lord.
[media]
[media]
With a ton of unique enemies sprawling the monastery grounds capable of showing you their individual combat prowess.
[media]
[media]

Are you a battle-hardened sword & shield adventurer or a staff-wielding magic artist? Maybe a long-ranged bow & arrow assassin? How about an agile dual-wielding bladesman? Even go wild as a shield & dagger throwing specialist? The choice is yours, prisoner.
[media]
[media]
With boss battles meant to test your accumulated skills and knowledge, each encounter assures every prisoner’s adventure to strive for the light is as unique as it can be.

[media]



[media]
